\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.debug.active}
\label{configuration:AmbethDebugActive}
\ClearAPI
Allows to run \AMBETH{} in debug mode. This e.g. enables more exceptions to ease debugging. Valid values are "true" or "false".
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.debug.active}}]
ambeth.debug.active=true
\end{lstlisting}
